density.description: Defined density models which can be used by AtmosphericFeaturesDrag dynamics

items.description: Configuration for a specific density model

name.description: Name of the density model which is used to reference it

type.description: The concrete type of the density model (e.g. JB2008, MSISv2 or DTM2020)

config.description: Configuration for the specific density model (e.g. Solmag index files or Height, Density, Scale for a Exponential Model)

wind.description: Defined wind models which can be used by AtmosphericFeaturesDrag dynamics

items.description: Configuration for a specific wind model

name.description: Name of the wind model which is used to reference it

type.description: The concret type of the wind model (e.g. HWM14 or HWM07)

config.description: Configuration for the specific wind model (e.g. Solmag index files)
